statements: SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, brand_worn FROM influencers WHERE posting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM influencers ORDER BY influencer_id DESC;
SELECT influencer_name FROM influencers WHERE brand_worn = 'Nike';
SELECT influencer_name, brand_worn FROM influencers WHERE posting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT influencer_name, brand_worn FROM influencers WHERE posting_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY posting_date DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, brand_worn, posting_date FROM influencers WHERE brand_worn LIKE '%Nike%' AND posting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT influencer_name, COUNT(*) AS post_count FROM influencers GROUP BY influencer_name HAVING post_count > 10;
SELECT influencer_name, brand_worn FROM influencers ORDER BY brand_worn ASC, influencer_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, followers FROM influencers ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT brand_name, designer FROM fashion_brands WHERE brand_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers > 5000;
SELECT name AS influencer_name, followers AS follower_count FROM influencers;
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers > 10000 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, followers FROM influencers WHERE followers < 5000 AND name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY followers ASC;
SELECT brand_name, designer FROM fashion_brands WHERE designer IS NOT NULL AND designer != 'N/A';
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers BETWEEN 5000 AND 20000 ORDER BY followers DESC, name ASC;
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers > 5000 AND name NOT LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY name ASC, followers DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT brand_name, founder_name FROM fashion_brands WHERE year_established > 2010;

SELECT influencer_name, brand_name, post_date FROM influencers JOIN influencer_wearing_brand ON influencers.influencer_id = influencer_wearing_brand.influencer_id JOIN fashion_brands ON influencer_wearing_brand.brand_id = fashion_brands.brand_id;
SELECT influencer_id, social_media_handle FROM influencers WHERE influencer_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY influencer_id DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, social_media_handle, followers_count FROM influencers;
SELECT * FROM fashion_brands WHERE year_established > 2010;

SELECT influencer_name, brand_name, post_date FROM influencers JOIN influencer_wearing_brand ON influencers.influencer_id = influencer_wearing_brand.influencer_id JOIN fashion_brands ON influencer_wearing_brand.brand_id = fashion_brands.brand_id WHERE followers_count > 50000;

SELECT influencer_name, brand_name, post_date FROM influencers JOIN influencer_wearing_brand ON influencers.influencer_id = influencer_wearing_brand.influencer_id JOIN fashion_brands ON influencer_wearing_brand.brand_id = fashion_brands.brand_id WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT influencer_name, brand_name, post_date FROM influencers JOIN influencer_wearing_brand ON influencers.influencer_id = influencer_wearing_brand.influencer_id JOIN fashion_brands ON influencer_wearing_brand.brand_id = fashion_brands.brand_id WHERE influencer_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT name, followers FROM influencers ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT id, name, country FROM brands WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE influencer_id = 1 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, SUM(likes) AS total_likes FROM engagements GROUP BY post_id;
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers > 1000;
SELECT name, followers FROM influencers ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT b.name, p.post_date FROM brands b JOIN posts p ON b.id = p.brand_id WHERE p.post_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT i.name AS influencer, e.likes, e.comments FROM influencers i JOIN posts p ON i.id = p.influencer_id JOIN engagements e ON p.id = e.post_id WHERE e.likes > 100 OR e.comments > 50;

SELECT b.name AS brand, SUM(e.likes) AS total_likes, SUM(e.comments) AS total_comments FROM brands b JOIN posts p ON b.id = p.brand_id JOIN engagements e ON p.id = e.post_id GROUP BY b.name ORDER BY total_likes DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT influencer_id, name, followers_count FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT * FROM brands ORDER BY brand_name DESC;
SELECT brand_name, product_type, founder FROM brands WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT influencer_id, COUNT(*) AS post_count FROM posts GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY date_joined DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, name, followers_count, date_joined FROM influencers WHERE brand_id IS NULL;
SELECT brand_name, product_type, country FROM brands WHERE founder = 'John Doe';

SELECT p.post_id, i.name as influencer_name, p.content, e.reaction FROM posts p JOIN influencers i ON p.influencer_id = i.influencer_id JOIN engagements e ON p.post_id = e.post_id WHERE e.reaction = 'like';
SELECT f.follower_id, i.name as influencer_name, f.follow_date, f.notification_preference FROM followers f JOIN influencers i ON f.influencer_id = i.influencer_id WHERE i.followers_count < 5000;
